title: Share of children of lower secondary school age achieving minimum proficiency in mathematics, by gender
subtitle: The share of children who achieve minimum [math](#dod:math-proficiency) proficiency by the end of [lower secondary](#dod:lower-secondary-education) education, where students can demonstrate skills in computation, application problems, matching tables and graphs, and making use of algebraic representations. This data accounts for school completion rates to estimate skills for all children, not just those in school.
